title: Engage & Earn
content: You can buy cover and earn more USDC by helping run the platfom, including voting on claims, investing in risk pools and voting on proposals.

title: Onboarding Cost
content: Onboarding gives you rights to the assets of the platform and involves a one-off access fee of 3 USDC (~ $3.09).

title: KYC / AML
content: To become a member, you will need to verify your identity using our Know-Your-Customer / Anti-Money-Laundering process. If this fails, your membership fee will be refunded to you.
